skillTree.name: Rotting Promethean
skillTree.description: The unnatural speed and brutality of a reanimated Promethean makes it the ideal mount for any Undead, battle-mongering pirate.

skillTree.name: Lucky Charm
skillTree.description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Cackle Fruit
skillTree.description: Being shot at whilst covered in a foul, sticky mess is no picnic.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Enchanted Ballistics
skillTree.description: Assuming you get it right and your shot doesn't turn to flowers on impact, these little extras tend to bring advantage.

skillTree.name: Powder Keg
skillTree.description: "If all else fails, shoot it squarely and dive into the drink!"

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "More Powder!"

skillTree.name: Dead Eyes
skillTree.description: …literally, though they never miss.

skillTree.name: Shark Bait
skillTree.description: …because once they're in the water, you want your targets to stay there… forever.

skillTree.name: Utility Belt
skillTree.description: Keep your tools on you at all times - you never know when you'll need them.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Cackle Fruit" and "Pyromaniac"

skillTree.name: Always Ready
skillTree.description: Death is always just a shot away.

skillTree.name: Blacker Powder
skillTree.description: "It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."

skillTree.name: Powder Monkey
skillTree.description: "Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"

skillTree.name: Blunderbuss
skillTree.description: "The recoil's a nightmare, but you can't deny the end result!"

skillTree.name: Gunsight
skillTree.description: A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.

skillTree.name: Pyromaniac
skillTree.description: Some beings just want to see the world burn.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Majesty
backgroundSkills.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

backgroundSkills.name: Devious
backgroundSkills.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -25%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +15%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Dread Incarnate
backgroundSkills.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

effects.description:
Melee defense: -2 for units
	(enemy armies in local province)

Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Lore Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
	(own army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Master of the Black Arts
backgroundSkills.description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

Miscast base chance: -15% for all spellcasters
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
